pkgmetadata.longdescription: Working with Google's 'Public Data Explorer' DSPL Metadata Files // Provides a collection of functions to set up 'Google Public Data Explorer' https://www.google.com/publicdata/ data visualization tool with your own data, building automatically the corresponding DataSet Publishing Language file, or DSPL (XML), metadata file jointly with the CSV files. All zip-up and ready to be published in 'Public Data Explorer'.
